content.description: Follow undercling hand jams and mostly good feet until you can reach over and gain the positive upper edge of the flake, then top out on lower angle slab. Downclimb the chimney on the opposite side of the boulder.
content.location: Located on the North side of the boulder above Hangover and Cat Like Reflexes. Go to the highest point of The Burbs boulders and stand with your back to the Little Dome proper, you will be facing Salathe Cling.

content.description:
The original grade given this route in The Dome Driver Manual is 5.8. However, it felt harder than that to me. A large piece fell off a few years ago, so the grade may have changed. 

  The over hanging roof section is burly and fun. However, the rock quality quickly becomes crumbly above the roof. I DO NOT THINK THE GEAR ABOVE THE ROOF WILL HOLD A FALL. So it's probably best to top rope it due to the poor rock quality higher up.
content.protection: Take something long to extend your anchor over the edge.
content.location: Obvious overhanging roof problem and left leaning crack at the climbers right side of the wall. Visible from the parking lot.

climbs.name: Cool Hands Spook
climbs.fa: Maybe Rick Watson, but others may have been earlier.

content.description: A short vertical hand crack. For the most part great rock quality, but a little rotten after you top out. This is a very fun and worthy crack problem.
content.location: Located about 500 yards from the Summit Trail. It hides among some boulders at the far right (East) side of the Burbs area. Between the Burbs and and Summit trail. A little bit below and West of the wash that houses Orgina Wall.

content.description: A decent and mildly overhanging crack problem. The rock quality is better than it looks. A good addition to the front side bouldering circuit.
content.location: Located on the same wall, but to the left of Hangover.

content.description: Really great boulder problem, Start seated at the lowest edges climb up through good holds (avoiding the choss)  Climbs really well avoiding the cruddy holds, might climb easier and lose stars if you were to use any of the choss (really crumbly jugs to the right of the boulder)
content.protection: low ball, one pad, check the top out was dirty, and there was a cactus growing out of the top as well that you probably want to avoid
content.location: Kind of a pain to find if you dont know where it is. if your looking up at the burbs from ground level it is down and left of the highest block boulder up on the dome(not part of this zone) If you know where the Salathe crack is, its much easier to find by going right and downhill from that boulder

content.description: Crouching start on a mini-jug side pull and the arete. Heel hook and slap your way to the horn at the top and mantle over.
content.location: Down 40 feet and two the right of Salathe Cling. This boulder has two problems. Albacore on the uphill side and Albacross (V5) on the downhill facing side.

content.description: The Burbs is a jumble of boulders close to the parking lot. Located Southeast of The Kingdom of Zilch, between Zilch and the Summit Trail.
